title: The Huge Adventures of Trevor a Cat/Foxbat and the Mimi
creator_credit: John Skibinski, John Taylor and Swinburne Institute of Technology. Film and Television School
brief_description: The hilarious story of a cat, whose hunting instincts are accidentally over-revived, plus the story of a flying fox which takes shelter in a cave, something he regrets when cave spirits attempt to capture him. Rated: G
title_for_label: The Huge Adventures of Trevor a Cat/Foxbat and the Mimi
